summary.span: 提供巡覽和使用者介面 (UI)，在多個步驟中收集相關資料。

span.span: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [精靈元件Wizard Components](#components) - [精靈步驟Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [資料收集精靈Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [精靈的命令名稱Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [動態變更步驟Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [精靈的外觀Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [使用版面配置範本Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 您可以使用控制權傳輸至：You can use the control to: - 收集多個步驟的相關的資料。Collect related data across multiple steps. - 分割大型的 Web 網頁，用來收集使用者輸入成較小的邏輯步驟。Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps. - 允許逐步線性或非線性導覽。Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps. ## 精靈元件Wizard Components 控制項由下列元件所組成：The control is made up of the following components: - A集合包含每個步驟的使用者介面所定義的網頁開發人員的步驟。A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer. - 內建瀏覽功能，以決定適當的按鈕以顯示根據值。Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the value. - 標頭區域，可自訂步驟的使用者是目前在顯示的特定資訊。A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on. - 控制項中的步驟可用來快速瀏覽到 [資訊看板] 區域。A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，保存在原始碼檢視。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您變更屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為可能指向不同的步驟。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. ## 精靈步驟Wizard Steps 每個中的步驟控制項有屬性，可決定此步驟中有的瀏覽功能的類型。Each of the steps in the control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has. 如果您未指定的值屬性，預設值是。If you do not specify a value for the property, the default value is . 下表列出可用的設定屬性及步驟的產生的行為。The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step. `WizardStepType.Auto` 瀏覽步驟呈現 UI 是由宣告該步驟的順序決定。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 此步驟為最後一個出現，The step is the last one to appear. 不會呈現巡覽按鈕。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 步驟是收集使用者資料的最後一個。The step is the last one that collects user data. **完成**呈現巡覽按鈕。The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 此步驟為第一個出現，The step is the first one to appear. A**上一步**不呈現 按鈕。A **Previous** button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 在步驟之間的任一步驟第一個和最後一個。The step is any step between the first and last. 應呈現出 [上一步] 和 [下一步] 巡覽按鈕。**Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation. ## 資料收集精靈Collecting Wizard Data 使用控制項，可以透過線性或非線性導覽收集資料。Using the control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation. 非線性導覽的一些範例會略過不必要的步驟，或傳回先前完成的步驟，以變更某些值。Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value. 控制項保持其狀態的步驟，因此不需要會保存到資料存放區，直到所有步驟的上一個步驟輸入的資料之間控制項都已完成。The control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the control have been completed. 或者，如果您想要收集的資料保存到資料存放區為每個步驟完成，例如當就會引發事件，應將屬性物件`false`，讓使用者無法回復至先前完成的步驟，且一旦已提交變更的資料。Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the event is raised, you should set the property of the object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted. ## 精靈的命令名稱Wizard Command Names 控制項繼承下列的命令名稱，從類別和類別： ， ， ，和。The control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and . 精靈控制項忽略這些命令名稱，而且不包含任何特殊的邏輯，可啟用瀏覽自動執行這些命令。The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation. 如果命令名稱遭到移除，或遺漏功能的按鈕控制項，擲回任何例外狀況。If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the control, no exception is thrown. 例如，如果按鈕遺漏的值，擲回任何例外狀況。For example, if the button is missing a value for , no exception is thrown. ## 動態變更步驟Dynamically Changing Steps 您可以使用方法或屬性動態變更目前顯示在中的步驟控制項。You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您以程式設計方式加入中`Page_Load`事件處理常式，您必須新增瀏覽到該頁面載入之前的步驟。If you programmatically add a in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading. ## 精靈的外觀Wizard Appearance 外觀控制項是可以完全自訂，透過範本、 面板和樣式設定。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings. 例如，您可以使用， ， ， ，和屬性，以自訂的介面控制項。For example, you can use the , , , , and properties to customize the interface of the control. > [!NOTE] > 設定， ， ， ， ，或屬性重新建立的子控制項控制項。Setting the , , , , , or property recreates the child controls of the control. 如此一來，子控制項的檢視狀態中的程序會遺失。As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process. 若要避免這種情況下，明確地維持控制項狀態的控制項的子系會明確地控制，或避免讓範本內部的控制項。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 請注意，控制項不支援特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈現的非標準或 quirks 模式。Note that the control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 若要取得最佳的 Internet Explorer 轉譯使用控制，請使用 XHTML 文件類型，它會根據預設，Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中加入。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 使用版面配置範本Formatting Using Layout Templates 控制項可讓您指定控制項的配置，而不需要您使用 HTML`table`項目。The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反地，您可以使用`LayoutTemplate`項目來指定版面配置。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在範本中，您建立預留位置，表示其中的項目應該以動態方式插入控制項的控制項。In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (這是類似於如何範本模型控制運作。)如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義控制項來收集使用者的名稱和地址，請輸入不同的送貨地址的選項。The following code example demonstrates how to define a control to collect a user's name and address, with the option to enter a separate shipping address. 如果使用者未選取**SeparateShippingCheckBox**，藉此發出要求來加入個別的送貨地址，控制項直接從移`Step2`至`Finish`。If the user does not select **SeparateShippingCheckBox**, thereby issuing a request to add a separate shipping address, the control moves directly from `Step2` to `Finish`. 上`Finish`步驟中，使用者可以選擇返回開頭，即可控制**GoBackButton**; 不過，它會採用使用者`Step2`因為屬性`Step1`設`false`。On the `Finish` step, the user has the option to return to the beginning of the control by clicking **GoBackButton**; however, it takes the user to `Step2` because the property for `Step1` is set to `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard/CS/wizardclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard/VB/wizardclassvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例是上述範例中所使用的網頁的程式碼後置檔案。The following code example is the code-behind file for the Web page used in the preceding example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的以零為起始的索引目前顯示在物件控制項。The property provides the zero-based index of the object that is currently displayed in the control. 您可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性，即可控制哪些步驟，會在執行階段顯示給使用者。You can programmatically set the property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，保存在原始碼檢視。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您變更屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為可能指向不同的步驟。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果您設定的值會為支援具有預設的任何步驟的精靈-1，發生下列行為：If you set the value of to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - 如果您以宣告方式設定-1 或其設為-1 做為預設值，控制項將永遠嘗試轉譯精靈的第一個步驟的集合。If you declaratively set to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard. - 如果您以程式設計方式設定為-1，控制項將不會呈現。If you programmatically set to -1, the control will not render. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the property of the control. 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`、屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step3`，否則屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/CS/wizardactivestepindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/VB/wizardactivestepindexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以存取的衍生類別只因為從其`protected`修飾詞。The method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier. 在衍生類別中，您可以使用方法，以判斷是否會在傳遞的索引可以用來設定屬性。In a derived class, you can use the method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the property. 方法會傳回`false`如果傳入的索引是指物件已被存取，且具有其屬性設定為`false`; 否則它會傳回`true`。The method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a object that has already been accessed and has its property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立衍生的類別，名為`CustomWizard`並覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a derived class named `CustomWizard` and override the method. 當 [資訊看板] 區域上的按鈕`CustomWizard`按一下控制項時，呼叫方法來判斷是否可以存取選取的步驟。When a button on the sidebar area of the `CustomWizard` control is clicked, the method is called to determine whether the selected step can be accessed. 然後會將訊息寫入至通知所發生的情況的使用者在包含網頁。A message is then written to the containing Web page informing the user of what has occurred. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep/CS/wizardallownavigationtostepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep/VB/wizardallownavigationtostepvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在按一下 [取消] 按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the **Cancel** button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時**取消**按鈕按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the control is clicked. 使用事件來提供額外的處理時**取消**按鈕。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 當**取消**按一下按鈕時，頁面會重新導向至http://www.wingtiptoys.com/。When the **Cancel** button is clicked, the page is redirected to http://www.wingtiptoys.com/. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick/CS/wizardcancelbuttonclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick/VB/wizardcancelbuttonclickvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的外觀**取消**按鈕控制項。The property defines the appearance for the **Cancel** button on the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併屬性。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 中的任何設定也就套用屬性會覆寫中的對應設定屬性。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會包含文字的顯示**取消**按鈕控制項。The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Cancel** button on the control. 值而定屬性，屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代映像，或連結的文字顯示的文字。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link. 下表列出值以及對其各自的影響**取消**按鈕文字。The following table lists the values and their respective effects on the **Cancel** button text. 文字會出現在按鈕上。Text appears on the button. 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文字會顯示為連結。Text appears as a link. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

value.span: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell border.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border. 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。因此，間距會套用到資料行中最寬的資料格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 因此，間距會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格。Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性以程式設計的版面配置以宣告方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to program the layout of the control declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCellPadding/CS/wizardcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCellPadding/VB/wizardcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的外觀**完成**按鈕控制項。The property defines the appearance for the **Finish** button on the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併屬性。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 中的任何設定也就套用屬性會覆寫中的對應設定屬性。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會包含文字的顯示**完成**按鈕控制項。The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Finish** button on the control. 值而定屬性，屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表列出的欄位值屬性，在每個個別的效果**完成**按鈕文字。The following table lists the field values for the property and the respective effect of each on the **Finish** button text. 文字會出現在按鈕上。Text appears on the button. 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文字會顯示為連結文字。Text appears as link text. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示瀏覽區域步驟控制項。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容步驟。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 範本的自訂內容內含物件。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以新增自訂內容物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式物件內嵌使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`標記。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中所包含的物件屬性必須包含兩個控制項，一個具有其屬性設為"MoveComplete 」，而且與其他其屬性設為"MovePrevious 」，才能啟用瀏覽功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature. 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用集合物件。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來建立自訂功能區的範本步驟控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the navigation area of the step for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 的控制項。You can use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the control. 若要指定版面配置範本，將`LayoutTemplate`元素內控制項標記。To specify a layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control markup. 內部`LayoutTemplate`項目，加入元件的預留位置控制項。Inside the `LayoutTemplate` element, add placeholders for the components of the control. 瀏覽、 資訊看板，與精靈步驟區段的預留位置控制項所需的`LayoutTemplate`項目。Placeholders for the navigation, sidebar, and wizard-step sections of the control are required in the `LayoutTemplate` element. > [!NOTE] > 您可以修改中的版面配置範本**來源**檢視。You can modify the layout template in **Source** view. 編輯中的版面配置範本**設計**不支援檢視。Editing the layout template in **Design** view is not supported. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入`LayoutTemplate`元素`Wizard`控制項，以及如何格式化的元件`Wizard`控制項使用`div`項目。The following example shows how to add a `LayoutTemplate` element to the `Wizard` control and how to format the components of the `Wizard` control by using `div` elements. 當控制項的轉譯、`div`而不是 HTML 表格格式控制項使用項目。When the control renders, the `div` elements will be used instead of HTML tables to format the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性上定義導覽區域中的按鈕的外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定個別按鈕樣式與合併屬性。The style settings for the property are merged with the individual button styles. 在個別的按鈕樣式屬性會套用任何設定會覆寫中的對應設定屬性。Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the property. 比方說，如果您設定`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性`"red"`和`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性`"green"`的色彩按鈕會變成紅色，因為個別樣式設定屬性覆寫的設定屬性。For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the property override the settings of the property. 下列個別按鈕樣式設定會覆寫屬性樣式：The following property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的 [資訊看板] 上的按鈕外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 會套用任何設定屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制 [資訊看板]，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control sidebar, the property has no effect.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示 [資訊看板] 區域控制項。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the sidebar area on a control. 建立指定的 [資訊看板] 區域的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the sidebar area is rendered. 範本的自訂內容內含物件。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以新增自訂內容物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式物件內嵌使用`SideBarTemplate`標記。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `SideBarTemplate` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 物件必須包含控制項或控制項屬性設定為`"SideBarList"`啟用提要欄位巡覽功能。The object must contain a control or control whose property is set to `"SideBarList"` to enable the sidebar navigation feature. 此外，`"SideBarList"`上或控制項必須包含控制項。Also, the `"SideBarList"` on the or control must contain an control. 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用集合物件。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入控制權傳輸至`SideBarTemplate`項目，以及如何使用控制項來巡覽步驟。The following example shows how to add a control to the `SideBarTemplate` element and how to use a control to navigate the steps. ```
```

value.span: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

span.span: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定讀取螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過 [資訊看板] 區域的內容可以隱藏影像的替代文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image that is read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the content for a sidebar area. 您指定的文字會提供具有描述可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的隱藏影像的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`false`、屬性不會建立隱藏的影像的替代文字。If the property is set to `false`, the property does not create a hidden image with alternate text. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示瀏覽區域步驟控制項。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容步驟。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 範本的自訂內容內含物件。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以新增自訂內容物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式物件內嵌使用`StartNavigationTemplate`標記。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `StartNavigationTemplate` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中所包含的物件屬性必須包含用來控制屬性設定為`"MoveNext"`啟用瀏覽功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain an control with the property set to `"MoveNext"` to enable the navigation feature. 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用集合物件。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的外觀**下一步**按鈕步驟控制項。The property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併屬性。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 中的任何設定也就套用屬性會覆寫中的對應設定屬性。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會包含文字的顯示**下一步**按鈕步驟控制項。The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 值而定屬性，屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表列出的欄位值屬性，在每個個別的效果**下一步**按鈕文字。The following table lists the field values for the property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text. 文字會出現在按鈕上。Text appears on the button. 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文字會顯示為連結。Text appears as a link. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 取得 物件的參考，該物件會定義 物件的設定。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that defines the settings for the objects.

value.span: 的參考，其會在 上定義 物件的樣式設定。

span.span: A reference to the that defines the style settings for the objects on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得的參考物件，定義的外觀物件控制項。The property gets a reference to a object that defines the appearance for the objects on the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併屬性控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property of the control. 中的任何設定也就套用屬性會覆寫中的對應設定屬性控制項。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property of the control. 下列屬性可以設定為覆寫屬性控制項：The following properties can be set to override the properties of the control: - - - - - - - - - 當您使用範本來定義外觀物件屬性沒有任何作用。When you use a template to define the appearance for the objects, the property has no effect.

summary.span: 取得包含所有為控制項所定義之 物件的集合。

value.span: ，表示所有為 所定義的 物件。

span.span: A representing all the objects defined for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的集合構成物件控制項。The property returns a collection of objects that make up the control. 您可以使用來存取集合中所包含的物件以程式設計方式控制。You can use the collection to access the objects that are contained in the control programmatically. 使用， ， ，和方法來管理物件在集合中以程式設計的方式。Use the , , , and methods to manipulate the objects in the collection programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，保存在原始碼檢視。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您變更屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為可能指向不同的步驟。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果控制項包含多個集合，集合將會合併。If the control contains multiple collections, the collections will be merged. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立以程式設計方式控制，以及如何使用方法，將物件加入至集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control programmatically and how to use the method to add objects to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/CS/wizardstepscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/VB/wizardstepsvb.aspx#1)]
